title: Import substitution does not promote globalization

content.prompt: Which of the following policies does NOT promote globalization?

choices.label: Accepting foreign direct investment in domestic firms
Signing treaties that call for reduced tariffs

unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development

topic.text: 5.1: Impact of Global Economic and Technological Forces
